description: [NPPSPY](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1131) captures user input into the Winlogon process by redirecting RPC traffic from legitimate listening DLLs within the operating system to a newly registered malicious item that allows for recording logon information in cleartext.(Citation: Huntress NPPSPY 2022)

external_references.description: Dray Agha. (2022, August 16). Cleartext Shenanigans: Gifting User Passwords to Adversaries With NPPSPY. Retrieved May 17, 2024.
